scripts.start: npm run start --prefix ./frontend & npm run start --prefix ./backend
scripts.style: cd ./frontend && npm run style && cd ../backend && npm run style
scripts.lint: cd ./frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.build: cd ./backend && npm run deploy && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd ./frontend && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test
scripts.test:report: cd ./frontend && npm run test:report && cd ../backend && npm run test:report
